author: SteveL-MSFT
body: From the discussion on Build and Deploy, it seems we should have a Pull verb.

comments.author: megamorf
comments.body: I assume `Get` is too generic then? Just curious :-)

comments.author: felixfbecker
comments.body: So what is the opposite of `Push` then? `Pop` or `Pull`?

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Not totally remembering the justification for this. Going to close it given there's no pressing need right now.

title: Add Pull verb
